segments.text: Oh, this is just maddening to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Look at the sheer waste of water from that sink!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's just pouring out onto the floor, creating a huge, messy puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the woman, she's standing right in it, completely unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can someone be so utterly absorbed in drying a dish that they don't notice a flood?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's just so frustrating to see such carelessness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now the children are getting into mischief behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That boy is practically inviting an accident by climbing on that wobbly stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's grabbing cookies, probably making a huge mess too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the sister is just as bad, eagerly awaiting her stolen treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole kitchen is a monument to inefficiency and impending disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water damage will be significant, I'm sure of it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone is going to have a very unpleasant surprise when they finally notice everything.
segments.speaker: PAR
